item.title: Spin Master Entertainment Greenlights Its First Original Film Directed by David Soren (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Spin Master Corp. has greenlit an animated, four-quadrant film directed by BAFTA and Annie Award nominee David Soren. This is the first original film by Spin Master’s entertainment studio, signifying

item.title: ‘Paw Patrol’ Studio Spin Master Promotes Marc De Vellis to Digital Games Head
item.description: He becomes executive vp and president of the toy maker’s Digital Games Creative Centre, with popular brands like ‘Toca Boca’ and ‘PikNik’ in its portfolio.
